Name: Orange Mac
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Whisky Mac with orange topping off the ginger.
Nutrition: One serving of Orange Mac contains 198 calories
